card.name: Abyssal Specter
card.property: Flying Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Open the gates, and bid them enter." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Adarkar Sentinel
card.property: {1}: Adarkar Sentinel gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We encountered the Sentinels in the wastes, near no living thing. Their purpose was inscrutable." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Adarkar Unicorn
card.property: {T}: Add {U} or {C}{U}. Spend this mana only to pay cumulative upkeep costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no nobler creature in all of Terisiare." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

card.name: Adarkar Wastes
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W} or {U}. Adarkar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Aegis of the Meek
card.property: {1}, {T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With this marvel, even the weak have a fighting chance!" —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Aggression
card.property: Enchant non-Wall creature Enchanted creature has first strike and trample. At the beginning of the end step of enchanted creature's controller, destroy that creature if it didn't attack this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The star that burns twice as bright burns half as long.

card.name: Altar of Bone
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Amulet of Quoz
card.property: Remove Amulet of Quoz from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. {T}, Sacrifice Amulet of Quoz: Target opponent may ante the top card of their library. If they don't, you flip a coin. If you win the flip, that player loses the game. If you lose the flip, you lose the game. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Anarchy
card.property: Destroy all white permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Shaman waved the staff, and the land itself went mad." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Arctic Foxes
card.property: Arctic Foxes can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater as long as defending player controls a snow land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those Foxes are wily, swift, and ferocious. They are the warriors of the snows." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

card.name: Arcum's Sleigh
card.property: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains vigilance until end of turn. Activate this ability only during combat and only if defending player controls a snow land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With the proper equipment and caution, one can travel anywhere." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Arcum's Weathervane
card.property: {2}, {T}: Target snow land is no longer snow. {2}, {T}: Target nonsnow basic land becomes snow.

card.name: Arcum's Whistle
card.property: {3}, {T}: Choose target non-Wall creature the active player has controlled continuously since the beginning of the turn. That player may pay {X}, where X is that creature's converted mana cost. If they don't pay, the creature attacks this turn if able, and at the beginning of the next end step, destroy it if it didn't attack this turn. Activate this ability only before attackers are declared.

card.name: Arenson's Aura
card.property: {W}, Sacrifice an enchantment: Destroy target enchantment. {3}{U}{U}: Counter target enchantment spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have my faith, and I have my prayers. But if push comes to shove, I've also got a little something extra." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Armor of Faith
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. {W}: Enchanted creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Keep your chainmail, warrior. I have my own form of protection." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Arnjlot's Ascent
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) {1}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dreams of a child fulfilled: The wind on my brow, the air 'neath my feet." —Arnjlot Olasson, Sky Mage

card.name: Ashen Ghoul
card.property: Haste {B}: Return Ashen Ghoul from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only if three or more creature cards are above Ashen Ghoul.

card.name: Aurochs
card.property: Trample Whenever Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One Auroch may feed a village, but a herd will flatten it.

card.name: Avalanche
card.property: Destroy X target snow lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The pass was completely blocked by the avalanche; we're forced to turn back. Nevertheless, we've gone farther and seen more than any before us." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Barbarian raids were a concern to those living in the northwest provinces, but the Skyknights never dealt with the problem in a systematic way. They thought of the Balduvians as an 'amusing model' of their forebears' culture." —Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're a hardy bunch, but I'd still bet that they just slept through the worst of the cold times." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Balduvian Conjurer
card.property: {T}: Target snow land becomes a 2/2 creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The very lands of Balduvia are alive." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

card.name: Balduvian Hydra
card.property: Balduvian Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+0 counters on it. Remove a +1/+0 counter from Balduvian Hydra: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Balduvian Hydra this turn. {R}{R}{R}: Put a +1/+0 counter on Balduvian Hydra. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Balduvian Shaman
card.property: {T}: Change the text of target white enchantment you control that doesn't have cumulative upkeep by replacing all instances of one color word with another. (For example, you may change "black creatures can't attack" to "blue creatures can't attack.") That enchantment gains "Cumulative upkeep {1}." (At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, that player puts an age counter on it, then sacrifices it unless they pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

card.name: Barbarian Guides
card.property: {2} {R}, {T}: Choose a land type. Target creature you control gains snow landwalk of the chosen type until end of turn. Return that creature to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a snow land of that type.)

card.name: Barbed Sextant
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Barbed Sextant: Add one mana of any color. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Baton of Morale
card.property: {2}: Target creature gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Goblins would kill to get ahold of this one." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Battle Cry
card.property: Untap all white creatures you control. Whenever a creature blocks this turn, it gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the thick of battle, you must keep your wits about you. Yelling a lot helps, too." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

card.name: Battle Frenzy
card.property: Green creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Nongreen creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One day you, too, shall drink the blood of your foes. It is something to look forward to." —Toothlicker Harj, Orcish Captain

card.name: Binding Grasp
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Binding Grasp unless you pay {1}{U}. You control enchanted creature. Enchanted creature gets +0/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What I want, I take." —Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

card.name: Black Scarab
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by black creatures. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a black permanent.

card.name: Blessed Wine
card.property: You gain 1 life. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May the bounty of Kjeld enrich your days." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Blinking Spirit
card.property: {0}: Return Blinking Spirit to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't look at it! Maybe it'll go away!" —Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician

card.name: Blizzard
card.property: Cast this spell only if you control a snow land. Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Creatures with flying don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

card.name: Blue Scarab
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by blue creatures. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a blue permanent.

card.name: Bone Shaman
card.property: {B}: Until end of turn, Bone Shaman gains "Creatures dealt damage by Bone Shaman this turn can't be regenerated this turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rattle me bones as I cross the floor And the bones in your grave will rattle no more.

card.name: Brainstorm
card.property: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I reeled from the blow, and then suddenly, I knew exactly what to do. Within moments, victory was mine." —Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

card.name: Brand of Ill Omen
card.property: Enchant creature Cumulative upkeep {R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Enchanted creature's controller can't cast creature spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let those who bear the brand receive no shelter, no kindness, and no comfort from our people." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Breath of Dreams
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Green creatures have "Cumulative upkeep {1}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Get up, blast you! They're attacking! Why are you all so slow?" —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

card.name: Brine Shaman
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. {1}{U}{U}, Sacrifice a creature: Counter target creature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Shamans of Marit Lage do her bidding in secret, but they do it gladly." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Brown Ouphe
card.property: {1} {G}, {T}: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ouphes love trinkets and love to take them apart. I only wish they wouldn't do so with the magical ones." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

card.name: Brushland
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. Brushland deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Burnt Offering
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Add X mana in any combination of {B} and/or {R}, where X is the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My foes serve me twice: in dying, and in death." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Call to Arms
card.property: As Call to Arms enters the battlefield, choose a color and an opponent. White creatures get +1/+1 as long as the chosen color is the most common color among nontoken permanents the chosen player controls but isn't tied for most common. When the chosen color isn't the most common color among nontoken permanents the chosen player controls or is tied for most common, sacrifice Call to Arms.

card.name: Caribou Range
card.property: Enchant land you control Enchanted land has "{W}{W}, {T}: Create a 0/1 white Caribou creature token." Sacrifice a Caribou token: You gain 1 life.

card.name: Celestial Sword
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So great is its power, only the chosen can wield it and live." —Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

card.name: Centaur Archer
card.property: {T}: Centaur Archer deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Centaurs will kill our Aesthir if they can; they've always been enemies. Destroy the horse-people on sight." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

card.name: Chaos Lord
card.property: First strike At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent gains control of Chaos Lord if the number of permanents is even. Chaos Lord can attack as though it had haste unless it entered the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Chaos Moon
card.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, count the number of permanents. If the number is odd, until end of turn, red creatures get +1/+1 and whenever a player taps a Mountain for mana, that player adds an additional {R}. If the number is even, until end of turn, red creatures get -1/-1 and if a player taps a Mountain for mana, that Mountain produces colorless mana instead of any other type.

card.name: Chromatic Armor
card.property: Enchant creature As Chromatic Armor enters the battlefield, choose a color. Chromatic Armor enters the battlefield with a sleight counter on it. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature by sources of the last chosen color. {X}: Put a sleight counter on Chromatic Armor and choose a color. X is the number of sleight counters on Chromatic Armor.

card.name: Chub Toad
card.property: Whenever Chub Toad blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chub Toad, Chub Toad At the door. Run away quick Or you'll run no more. —Traditional children's rhyme

card.name: Circle of Protection: Black
card.property: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Blue
card.property: {1}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Green
card.property: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Red
card.property: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: White
card.property: {1}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Clairvoyance
card.property: Look at target player's hand. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As we followed the ice wall, we had the distinct feeling of being watched. Many of the party wanted to turn back." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Cloak of Confusion
card.property: Enchant creature you control Whenever enchanted creature attacks and isn't blocked, you may have it assign no combat damage this turn. If you do, defending player discards a card at random.

card.name: Cold Snap
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Cold Snap deals damage to that player equal to the number of snow lands they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Who knows from whence the winter comes?

card.name: Conquer
card.property: Enchant land You control enchanted land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why do we trade with those despicable Elves? You don't live in forests, you burn them!" —Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

card.name: Cooperation
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has banding. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Elves train our healers, and we keep the Orcs at bay. Most Elvish bargains aren't as fair." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

card.name: Counterspell
card.property: Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The duel was going badly for me, and Zur thought I was finished. He boasted that he would eat my soul—but all he ate were his words." —Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

card.name: Crown of the Ages
card.property: {4}, {T}: Attach target Aura attached to a creature to another creature.

card.name: Curse of Marit Lage
card.property: When Curse of Marit Lage enters the battlefield, tap all Islands. Islands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our world has not felt her thundering steps in lifetimes, but Marit Lage's presence is still with us." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Dance of the Dead
card.property: Enchant creature card in a graveyard When Dance of the Dead enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with Dance of the Dead." Put enchanted creature card onto the battlefield tapped under your control and attach Dance of the Dead to it. When Dance of the Dead leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {1}{B}. If the player does, untap that creature.

card.name: Dark Banishing
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Will not the mountains quake and hills melt at the coming of the darkness? Share this vision with your enemies, Lim-Dûl, and they shall wither." —Leshrac, Walker of Night

card.name: Dark Ritual
card.property: Add {B}{B}{B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Leshrac, my liege, grant me the power I am due." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Death Ward
card.property: Regenerate target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes, a soul is not ready to complete its journey to the next world." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Deflection
card.property: Change the target of target spell with a single target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Up and down, over and through, back around— the joke's on you.

card.name: Demonic Consultation
card.property: Choose a card name. Exile the top six cards of your library, then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with the chosen name. Put that card into your hand and exile all other cards revealed this way.

card.name: Despotic Scepter
card.property: {T}: Destroy target permanent you own. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We were not meant to have such terrible things. They should be left where we found them, if not destroyed!" —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

card.name: Diabolic Vision
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen the true path. I will not warm myself by the fire—I will become the flame." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Dire Wolves
card.property: Dire Wolves has banding as long as you control a Plains. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's amazing how scared a city kid can get at a dog. Now, of course, I'd cross Terisiare alone, and keep no watch if I had a pack of greys hanging on my flanks as I went." —Oddveig Ulfsson, caravan scout

card.name: Disenchant
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I implore you not to forget the horrors of the past. You would have us start the Brothers' War anew!" —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

card.name: Dread Wight
card.property: At end of combat, put a paralyzation counter on each creature blocking or blocked by Dread Wight and tap those creatures. Each of those creatures doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as it has a paralyzation counter on it. Each of those creatures gains "{4}: Remove a paralyzation counter from this creature."

card.name: Dreams of the Dead
card.property: {1} {U}: Return target white or black creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains "Cumulative upkeep {2}." If the creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else. (At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, that player puts an age counter on it, then sacrifices it unless they pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

card.name: Drift of the Dead
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Drift of the Dead's power and toughness are each equal to the number of snow lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take their dead, and entomb them in the snow. Risen, they shall serve a new purpose." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Drought
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Drought unless you pay {W}{W}. Spells cost an additional "Sacrifice a Swamp" to cast for each black mana symbol in their mana costs. Activated abilities cost an additional "Sacrifice a Swamp" to activate for each black mana symbol in their activation costs.

card.name: Dwarven Armory
card.property: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Put a +2/+2 counter on target creature. Activate this ability only during any upkeep step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Few of us left, now. Confounded Yeti have opened all the vents. We'd best hide here with the weapons." —Perena Deepcutter, Dwarven Armorer

card.name: Earthlink
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Earthlink unless you pay {2}. Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller sacrifices a land.

card.name: Earthlore
card.property: Enchant land you control Tap enchanted land: Target blocking creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if enchanted land is untapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even the ground is our friend." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Elder Druid
card.property: {3} {G}, {T}: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am older than any Elder Druid before me, and still no child has been born with the Mark to take my place. When will the wheel turn?" —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Elemental Augury
card.property: {3}: Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is the changing of perception that is important." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

card.name: Elkin Bottle
card.property: {3}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card.

card.name: Elvish Healer
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. If it's a green creature, prevent the next 2 damage instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Kjeldorans keep the Orcs at bay and we train their healers. Most human bargains aren't as fair." —Laina of the Elvish Council

card.name: Enduring Renewal
card.property: Play with your hand revealed. If you would draw a card, reveal the top card of your library instead. If it's a creature card, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, draw a card. Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return it to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: That which lasts longest serves best.

card.name: Energy Storm
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Prevent all damage that would be dealt by instant and sorcery spells. Creatures with flying don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

card.name: Enervate
card.property: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Worlds turn in crucial moments of decision. Make your choice." —Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

card.name: Errant Minion
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay any amount of mana. Errant Minion deals 2 damage to that player. Prevent X of that damage, where X is the amount of mana that player paid this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Abandon not your faith when others abandon you.

card.name: Errantry
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and can only attack alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no shame in solitude. The lone Knight may succeed where a hundred founder." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

card.name: Essence Filter
card.property: Destroy all enchantments or all nonwhite enchantments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Freyalise has cleansed our bodies and minds of the plagues of Kjeldor; all she asks in return is that we keep pure our newly given home in Fyndhorn." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Essence Flare
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -0/-1 counter on that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Never underestimate the power of the soul unleashed.

card.name: Essence Vortex
card.property: Destroy target creature unless its controller pays life equal to its toughness. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Masters who sacrifice for servants will receive the gift of loyalty.

card.name: Fanatical Fever
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let go your fury, and hone your anger. Become the fist of Freyalise!" —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Fear
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even the bravest of warriors yet knows the dark clutch of fright upon his stalwart heart." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Fiery Justice
card.property: Fiery Justice deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Target opponent gains 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fire of justice burns like nothing else." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Fire Covenant
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life. Fire Covenant deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

card.name: Flame Spirit
card.property: {R}: Flame Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The spirit of the flame is the spirit of change." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Flare
card.property: Flare deals 1 damage to any target. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I strive for elegance and speed in my work." —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

card.name: Flooded Woodlands
card.property: Green creatures can't attack unless their controller sacrifices a land for each green creature they control that's attacking. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Freyalise's tears bring life and renewal, though they also bring trouble.

card.name: Flow of Maggots
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Flow of Maggots can't be blocked by non-Wall creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The very earth seemed alive and made a sound like the writhing of the damned." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

card.name: Folk of the Pines
card.property: {1} {G}: Folk of the Pines gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our friends of the forest take many forms, yet all serve the will of Freyalise." —Laina of the Elvish Council

card.name: Forbidden Lore
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn."

card.name: Force Void
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My mind and spirit are one—a barrier not readily passed." —Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

card.name: Forgotten Lore
card.property: Target opponent chooses a card in your graveyard. You may pay {G}. If you do, repeat this process except that opponent can't choose a card already chosen for Forgotten Lore. Then put the last chosen card into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In ashes are the gems of history.

card.name: Formation
card.property: Target creature gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.) Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have been a warrior for over four hundred years, and yet each generation of Kjeldorans teaches me new tricks. There can be no better allies." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

card.name: Foul Familiar
card.property: Foul Familiar can't block. {B}, Pay 1 life: Return Foul Familiar to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Serve me, and live forever." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Foxfire
card.property: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the foolish fear Foxfire." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Freyalise Supplicant
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a red or white creature: Freyalise Supplicant deals damage to any target equal to half the sacrificed creature's power, rounded down.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have joined with the Druids of the Juniper Order. Our faith is one." —Laina of the Elvish Council

card.name: Freyalise's Charm
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a black spell, you may pay {G}{G}. If you do, you draw a card. {G}{G}: Return Freyalise's Charm to its owner's hand.

card.name: Freyalise's Winds
card.property: Whenever a permanent becomes tapped, put a wind counter on it. If a permanent with a wind counter on it would untap during its controller's untap step, remove all wind counters from it instead.

card.name: Fumarole
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay 3 life. Destroy target creature and target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Too many of us have died in the explosions that wrack these hills." —Klazina Jansdotter, Leader of the Order of the Sacred Torch

card.name: Fylgja
card.property: Enchant creature Fylgja enters the battlefield with four healing counters on it. Remove a healing counter from Fylgja: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature this turn. {2}{W}: Put a healing counter on Fylgja.

card.name: Fyndhorn Bow
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With a bow like this, the hunting is always good." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

card.name: Fyndhorn Brownie
card.property: {2} {G}, {T}: Untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've been insulted by drunks in a hundred inns, but never as skillfully or annoyingly as by those blasted Brownies." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

card.name: Fyndhorn Elder
card.property: {T}: Add {G}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do we know what we're doing? Yes—the will of Freyalise." —Laina of the Elvish Council

card.name: Fyndhorn Elves
card.property: {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Living side by side with the Elves for so long leaves me with no doubt that we serve the same goddess." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Fyndhorn Pollen
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) All creatures get -1/-0. {1}{G}: All creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I breathed deeply, and suddenly I knew not who or where I was." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

card.name: Game of Chaos
card.property: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, you gain 1 life and target opponent loses 1 life, and you decide whether to flip again. If you lose the flip, you lose 1 life and that opponent gains 1 life, and that player decides whether to flip again. Double the life stakes with each flip.

card.name: Gangrenous Zombies
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Gangrenous Zombies: Gangrenous Zombies deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. If you control a snow Swamp, Gangrenous Zombies deals 2 damage to each creature and each player instead.

card.name: Gaze of Pain
card.property: Until end of turn, whenever a creature you control attacks and isn't blocked, you may choose to have it deal damage equal to its power to a target creature. If you do, it assigns no combat damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Remove the guardians to ensure your victory.

card.name: General Jarkeld
card.property: {T}: Switch the blocking creatures of two target attacking creatures. Activate this ability only during the declare blockers step.

card.name: Ghostly Flame
card.property: Black and/or red permanents and spells are colorless sources of damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Walk slowly when in the nether world, and seek that which calls." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Giant Growth
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here in Fyndhorn, the goddess Freyalise is generous to her children." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Giant Trap Door Spider

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So large and so quiet—a combination best avoided." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Glacial Chasm
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Pay 2 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Glacial Chasm enters the battlefield, sacrifice a land. Creatures you control can't attack. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

card.name: Glacial Crevasses
card.property: Sacrifice a snow Mountain: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We were chasing Lim-Dûl when the ridge in front of us suddenly crumbled. I can't believe it was mere coincidence." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

card.name: Glacial Wall
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are farther west than any could have imagined possible, but I still wish to press on. Unfortunately, huge walls of ice block further travel. We can't believe they are natural." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Glaciers
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Glaciers unless you pay {W}{U}. All Mountains are Plains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even the highest mountain can be ground to dust." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

card.name: Goblin Lyre
card.property: Sacrifice Goblin Lyre: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, Goblin Lyre deals damage to target opponent or planeswalker equal to the number of creatures you control. If you lose the flip, Goblin Lyre deals damage to you equal to the number of creatures that opponent or that planeswalker's controller controls.

card.name: Goblin Mutant
card.property: Trample Goblin Mutant can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 3 or greater. Goblin Mutant can't block creatures with power 3 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If only it had three brains, too.

card.name: Goblin Sappers
Goblin Ski Patrol
card.property: {1} {R}: Goblin Ski Patrol gets +2/+0 and gains flying. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step. Activate this ability only once and only if you control a snow Mountain.

card.name: Goblin Snowman
card.property: Whenever Goblin Snowman blocks, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by it this turn. {T}: Goblin Snowman deals 1 damage to target creature it's blocking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Strength in numbers? Right." —Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician

card.name: Gorilla Pack
card.property: Gorilla Pack can't attack unless defending player controls a Forest. When you control no Forests, sacrifice Gorilla Pack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We learned this at a dear price: once you cross the great river, get through the Yavimaya forest at top speed." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Gravebind
card.property: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One foot in the grave, firmly planted.

card.name: Green Scarab
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by green creatures. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a green permanent.

card.name: Grizzled Wolverine
card.property: {R}: Grizzled Wolverine gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only during the declare blockers step, only if at least one creature is blocking Grizzled Wolverine, and only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before you release a Wolverine from the trap, make sure it's really dead." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Hallowed Ground
card.property: {W} {W}: Return target nonsnow land you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "On this site where Kjeld's blood was spilled, let none raise a fist or deny a beggar." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Halls of Mist
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Creatures that attacked during their controller's last turn can't attack.

card.name: Heal
card.property: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes even the smallest boon can save a life." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Hecatomb
card.property: When Hecatomb enters the battlefield, sacrifice Hecatomb unless you sacrifice four creatures. Tap an untapped Swamp you control: Hecatomb deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Hematite Talisman
card.property: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, untap target permanent.

card.name: Hipparion
card.property: Hipparion can't block creatures with power 3 or greater unless you pay {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Someone once said that Hipparions are to Warriors what Aesthir are to Skyknights. Don't believe it." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

card.name: Hoar Shade
card.property: {B}: Hoar Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The creature we fought in the western waste was doubly dangerous: mortally wounded, it rebounded and attacked again." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Hot Springs
card.property: Enchant land you control Enchanted land has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Warmth is life; heat is peace.

card.name: Howl from Beyond
card.property: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the mouths of my servants, my voice shall emerge to shake the souls of my foes." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Hurricane
card.property: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This was quite possibly the least pleasant occurrence on the entire expedition." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Hyalopterous Lemure
card.property: {0}: Hyalopterous Lemure gets -1/-0 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Lemures looked harmless, until they descended on my troops. Within moments, only bones remained." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

card.name: Hydroblast
card.property: Choose one — • Counter target spell if it's red. • Destroy target permanent if it's red.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Heed the lessons of our time: the forms of water may move the land itself and hold captive the fires within." —Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

card.name: Hymn of Rebirth
card.property: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There will come soft rains, and spring shall be amongst us, a welcome friend." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Ice Cauldron
card.property: {X}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Ice Cauldron and exile a nonland card from your hand. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled. Note the type and amount of mana spent to pay this activation cost. Activate this ability only if there are no charge counters on Ice Cauldron. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Ice Cauldron: Add Ice Cauldron's last noted type and amount of mana. Spend this mana only to cast the last card exiled with Ice Cauldron.

card.name: Ice Floe
card.property: You may choose not to untap Ice Floe during your untap step. {T}: Tap target creature without flying that's attacking you. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Ice Floe remains tapped.

card.name: Iceberg
card.property: Iceberg enters the battlefield with X ice counters on it. {3}: Put an ice counter on Iceberg. Remove an ice counter from Iceberg: Add {C}.

card.name: Icequake
card.property: Destroy target land. If that land was a snow land, Icequake deals 1 damage to that land's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the earth shakes, and their animals are swallowed up by the ground, perhaps they will think twice before attacking again." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Icy Manipulator
card.property: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The scavengers who first found it called it the 'Bone Crank.' Not a bad name, I'd say." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Icy Prison
card.property: When Icy Prison enters the battlefield, exile target creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Icy Prison unless any player pays {3}. When Icy Prison leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Illusionary Forces
card.property: Flying Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This school was founded in secret, operates in secret, and exists for the teaching of secrets. Those who would alter reality must first escape it." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

card.name: Illusionary Presence
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of your upkeep, choose a land type. Illusionary Presence gains landwalk of the chosen type until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a land of that type.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We could feel the Shaman's power, as surely as we felt the storm." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Illusionary Terrain
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) As Illusionary Terrain enters the battlefield, choose two basic land types. Basic lands of the first chosen type are the second chosen type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The drawing of maps is fruitless in the west near the ice walls; the very earth is formless." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Illusionary Wall
card.property: Defender, flying, first strike Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let them see what is not there and feel what does not touch them. When they no longer trust their senses, that is the time to strike." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

card.name: Illusions of Grandeur
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Illusions of Grandeur enters the battlefield, you gain 20 life. When Illusions of Grandeur leaves the battlefield, you lose 20 life.

card.name: Imposing Visage
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can't believe they expect me to fight with this rabble. A Goblin in a big mask sends 'em running for cover." —Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

card.name: Incinerate
card.property: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yes, I think 'toast' is an appropriate description." —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

card.name: Infernal Darkness
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Pay {B} and 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) If a land is tapped for mana, it produces {B} instead of any other type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I thought the day had brought enough horrors for our ragged band, but the night was far worse." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

card.name: Infernal Denizen
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice two Swamps. If you can't, tap Infernal Denizen, and an opponent may gain control of a creature you control of their choice for as long as Infernal Denizen remains on the battlefield. {T}: Gain control of target creature for as long as Infernal Denizen remains on the battlefield.

card.name: Infinite Hourglass
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on Infinite Hourglass. All creatures get +1/+0 for each time counter on Infinite Hourglass. {3}: Remove a time counter from Infinite Hourglass. Any player may activate this ability but only during any upkeep step.

card.name: Infuse
card.property: Untap target artifact, creature, or land. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The potential for change lies in all things. Know a thing's nature, know its possibilities, and know it anew." —Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

card.name: Jester's Cap
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Cap: Search target player's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Know your foes' strengths as well as their weaknesses." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Jester's Mask
card.property: Jester's Mask enters the battlefield tapped. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Mask: Target opponent puts the cards from their hand on top of their library. Search that player's library for that many cards. That player puts those cards into their hand, then shuffles their library.

card.name: Jeweled Amulet
card.property: {1}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Jeweled Amulet. Note the type of mana spent to pay this activation cost. Activate this ability only if there are no charge counters on Jeweled Amulet. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Jeweled Amulet: Add one mana of Jeweled Amulet's last noted type.

card.name: Johtull Wurm
card.property: Whenever Johtull Wurm becomes blocked, it gets -2/-1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To bring her down we must be on all sides at once—leave one avenue open and we'll all be dead." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

card.name: Jokulhaups
card.property: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I was shocked when I first saw the aftermath of the Yavimaya Valley disaster. The raging waters had swept away trees, bridges, and even houses. My healers had much work to do." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Juniper Order Druid
card.property: {T}: Untap target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The filthy towns of Kjeldor are no place for anyone to live. Fyndhorn is our home now." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Justice
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Justice unless you pay {W}{W}. Whenever a red creature or spell deals damage, Justice deals that much damage to that creature's or spell's controller.

card.name: Karplusan Forest
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. Karplusan Forest deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Karplusan Giant
card.property: Tap an untapped snow land you control: Karplusan Giant gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They aren't the brightest or the quickest of Giants. For that matter, the same holds true if you compare them to rocks." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Karplusan Yeti
card.property: {T}: Karplusan Yeti deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Karplusan Yeti.

card.name: Kelsinko Ranger
card.property: {1} {W}: Target green creature gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rangers not trained by the Elves just aren't the same." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

card.name: Kjeldoran Dead
card.property: When Kjeldoran Dead enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature. {B}: Regenerate Kjeldoran Dead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They shall kill those whom once they loved." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Kjeldoran Elite Guard
card.property: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Kjeldoran Elite Guard. Activate this ability only during combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The winged helms of the Guard are put on for pageants—but taken off for war.

card.name: Kjeldoran Frostbeast
card.property: At end of combat, destroy all creatures blocking or blocked by Kjeldoran Frostbeast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Two of my Warriors found that the creature was dangerous not only in combat, but also in simple proximity." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Kjeldoran Guard
card.property: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Kjeldoran Guard. Activate this ability only during combat and only if defending player controls no snow lands.

card.name: Kjeldoran Knight
card.property: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.) {1}{W}: Kjeldoran Knight gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {W}{W}: Kjeldoran Knight gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who do not ride the wind on Aesthir still command loyalty and respect." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

card.name: Kjeldoran Phalanx
card.property: First strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's nothing I like better than watching a street full of soldiers kicking down the doors of the guilty and the impure." —Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

card.name: Kjeldoran Royal Guard
card.property: {T}: All combat damage that would be dealt to you by unblocked creatures this turn is dealt to Kjeldoran Royal Guard instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Honorable in battle, generous in death." —Motto of the Kjeldoran Royal Guard

card.name: Kjeldoran Skycaptain
card.property: Flying; first strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If we do our duty and uphold our honor, Kjeldor shall stand for a thousand years." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

card.name: Kjeldoran Skyknight
card.property: Flying; first strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My Aesthir is my most trusted ally. We fight as one and live as one, and we will die as one." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

card.name: Kjeldoran Warrior
card.property: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give me a thousand such Warriors and I could change the world." —Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

card.name: Knight of Stromgald
card.property: Protection from white {B}: Knight of Stromgald gains first strike until end of turn. {B}{B}: Knight of Stromgald gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kjeldorans should rule supreme, and to the rest, death!" —Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

card.name: Krovikan Elementalist

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Elementalists' talents could be useful if turned to other purposes." —Zur the Enchanter

card.name: Krovikan Fetish
card.property: Enchant creature When Krovikan Fetish enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some Krovikans find strength in the ears and eyes of their victims and wear such fetishes into battle.

card.name: Krovikan Sorcerer
card.property: {T}, Discard a nonblack card: Draw a card. {T}, Discard a black card: Draw two cards, then discard one of them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These Sorcerers always seem to have another surprise up their sleeves." —Zur the Enchanter

card.name: Krovikan Vampire
card.property: At the beginning of each end step, if a creature dealt damage by Krovikan Vampire this turn died, put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Sacrifice it when you lose control of Krovikan Vampire.

card.name: Land Cap
card.property: Land Cap doesn't untap during your untap step if it has a depletion counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a depletion counter from Land Cap. {T}: Add {W} or {U}. Put a depletion counter on Land Cap.

card.name: Lapis Lazuli Talisman
card.property: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, untap target permanent.

card.name: Lava Burst
card.property: Lava Burst deals X damage to any target. If Lava Burst would deal damage to a creature, that damage can't be prevented or dealt instead to another permanent or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Overkill? This isn't a game of Kick-the-Ouphe!" —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

card.name: Lava Tubes
card.property: Lava Tubes doesn't untap during your untap step if it has a depletion counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a depletion counter from Lava Tubes. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. Put a depletion counter on Lava Tubes.

card.name: Legions of Lim-Dûl
card.property: Snow swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a snow Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen the faces of my dead friends among that grim band, and I can bear no more." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield.

card.name: Leshrac's Rite
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has swampwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bind me to thee, my soul to thine. I am your servant and your slave. I shall hunger for your word and thirst for your blessing. Blood for blood, flesh for flesh, Leshrac, my lord." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Leshrac's Sigil
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a green spell, you may pay {B}{B}. If you do, look at that player's hand and choose a card from it. The player discards that card. {B}{B}: Return Leshrac's Sigil to its owner's hand.

card.name: Lhurgoyf
card.property: Lhurgoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ach! Hans, run! It's the Lhurgoyf!" —Saffi Eriksdotter, last words

card.name: Lightning Blow
card.property: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you do it right, they'll never know what hit them." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

card.name: Lim-Dûl's Cohort
card.property: Whenever Lim-Dûl's Cohort blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature can't be regenerated this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Join me in the place of power, you risen dead. Join me where the waters weep and the trees have no hearts." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Lim-Dûl's Hex
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, for each player, Lim-Dûl's Hex deals 1 damage to that player unless they pay {B} or {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The weak shall fall. The strong shall remain." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Lost Order of Jarkeld
card.property: As Lost Order of Jarkeld enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. Lost Order of Jarkeld's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of creatures the chosen player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let us remember brave Jarkeld and his troops, who perished in the Adarkar Wastes so long ago." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Lure
card.property: Enchant creature All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

card.name: Maddening Wind
card.property: Enchant creature Cumulative upkeep {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Maddening Wind deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is Freyalise, walking on the world." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Magus of the Unseen
card.property: {1} {U}, {T}: Untap target artifact an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the artifact, tap it.

card.name: Malachite Talisman
card.property: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, untap target permanent.

card.name: Márton Stromgald
card.property: Whenever Márton Stromgald attacks, other attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn for each attacking creature other than Márton Stromgald. Whenever Márton Stromgald blocks, other blocking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn for each blocking creature other than Márton Stromgald.

card.name: Melee
card.property: Cast this spell only during your turn and only during combat before blockers are declared. You choose which creatures block this combat and how those creatures block. Whenever a creature attacks and isn't blocked this combat, untap it and remove it from combat.

card.name: Melting
card.property: All lands are no longer snow.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who needs the sun when you've got me around?" —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

card.name: Mercenaries
card.property: {3}: The next time Mercenaries would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Blasted amateurs! Doesn't the queen think we can fight well enough on our own?" —Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

card.name: Merieke Ri Berit
card.property: Merieke Ri Berit doesn't untap during your untap step. {T}: Gain control of target creature for as long as you control Merieke Ri Berit. When Merieke Ri Berit leaves the battlefield or becomes untapped, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Mesmeric Trance
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) {U}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Magic overused can freeze the mind. Creativity is more important than power." —Zur the Enchanter

card.name: Meteor Shower
card.property: Meteor Shower deals X plus 1 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Eenie, meenie, minie, moe . . . oh, why not all of them?" —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

card.name: Mind Ravel
card.property: Target player discards a card. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An end to reason, an end to order. Forget all that has been.

card.name: Mind Warp
card.property: Look at target player's hand and choose X cards from it. That player discards those cards.

card.name: Mind Whip
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {3}. If they don't, Mind Whip deals 2 damage to that player and you tap that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A mind in agony is a sparrow without wings." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Minion of Leshrac
card.property: Protection from black At the beginning of your upkeep, Minion of Leshrac deals 5 damage to you unless you sacrifice a creature other than Minion of Leshrac. If Minion of Leshrac deals damage to you this way, tap it. {T}: Destroy target creature or land.

card.name: Minion of Tevesh Szat
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, Minion of Tevesh Szat deals 2 damage to you unless you pay {B}{B}. {T}: Target creature gets +3/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A minion given over to Tevesh Szat is a stronger minion gained." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Mistfolk
card.property: {U}: Counter target spell that targets Mistfolk.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Although my official log will state there is no evidence pointing to the existence of the Mistfolk, my certainty is lessened by the cursed consistency of the expedition's eyewitness accounts." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Mole Worms
card.property: You may choose not to untap Mole Worms during your untap step. {T}: Tap target land. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Mole Worms remains tapped.

card.name: Monsoon
card.property: At the beginning of each player's end step, tap all untapped Islands that player controls and Monsoon deals X damage to the player, where X is the number of Islands tapped this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No one in her right mind would venture off the coast of Kjeldor during this season." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Moor Fiend
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let them close the gates of Krov from dusk until dawn if they so choose. It matters not. My fiends shall yet rend their flesh from their bones." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Mountain Goat
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Folklore has it that to capture a Mountain Goat is a sign of divine blessing. I just know it's a sign that dinner is on the way." —Klazina Jansdotter, Leader of the Order of the Sacred Torch

card.name: Mountain Titan

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Titans claimed to draw strength from the rocks, but I suspect them of some darker allegiance." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Mudslide
card.property: Creatures without flying don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may choose any number of tapped creatures without flying they control and pay {2} for each creature chosen this way. If the player does, untap those creatures.

card.name: Musician
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) {T}: Put a music counter on target creature. If it doesn't have "At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy this creature unless you pay {1} for each music counter on it," it gains that ability.

card.name: Mystic Might
card.property: Enchant land you control Cumulative upkeep {1}{U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn."

card.name: Mystic Remora
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {4}.

card.name: Nacre Talisman
card.property: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, untap target permanent.

card.name: Naked Singularity
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {3} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) If tapped for mana, Plains produce {R}, Islands produce {G}, Swamps produce {W}, Mountains produce {U}, and Forests produce {B} instead of any other type.

card.name: Nature's Lore
card.property: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fyndhorn is our home." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Necropotence
card.property: Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

card.name: Norritt
card.property: {T}: Untap target blue creature. {T}: Choose target non-Wall creature the active player has controlled continuously since the beginning of the turn. That creature attacks this turn if able. Destroy it at the beginning of the next end step if it didn't attack this turn. Activate this ability only before attackers are declared.

card.name: Oath of Lim-Dûl
card.property: Whenever you lose life, for each 1 life you lost, sacrifice a permanent other than Oath of Lim-Dûl unless you discard a card. (Damage dealt to you causes you to lose life.) {B}{B}: Draw a card.

card.name: Onyx Talisman
card.property: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, untap target permanent.

card.name: Orcish Cannoneers
card.property: {T}: Orcish Cannoneers deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a thankless job, and you'll probably die in an explosion. But the pay is pretty good." —Toothlicker Harj, Orcish Captain

card.name: Orcish Conscripts
card.property: Orcish Conscripts can't attack unless at least two other creatures attack. Orcish Conscripts can't block unless at least two other creatures block.

card.name: Orcish Farmer
card.property: {T}: Target land becomes a Swamp until its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yes, the Farmers keep our soldiers fed. But why do they have to make every battlefield a pigpen?" —Toothlicker Harj, Orcish Captain

card.name: Orcish Healer
card.property: {R} {R}, {T}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn. {B}{B}{R}, {T}: Regenerate target black or green creature. {R}{G}{G}, {T}: Regenerate target black or green creature.

card.name: Orcish Librarian
card.property: {R}, {T}: Look at the top eight cards of your library. Exile four of them at random, then put the rest on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Us hungry, need food . . . . Lots of books . . . . Hmm . . . .

card.name: Orcish Lumberjack
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Add three mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How did I ever let myself get talked into this project?" —Toothlicker Harj, Orcish Captain

card.name: Orcish Squatters
card.property: Whenever Orcish Squatters attacks and isn't blocked, you may gain control of target land defending player controls for as long as you control Orcish Squatters. If you do, Orcish Squatters assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Order of the Sacred Torch
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life: Counter target black spell.

card.name: Order of the White Shield
card.property: Protection from black {W}: Order of the White Shield gains first strike until end of turn. {W}{W}: Order of the White Shield gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Shall we turn away a worthy soul because his parents were peasants? I think not." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

card.name: Pale Bears
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Daughter, on the day you have killed your Pale Bear, then will I give you your true name." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Panic
card.property: Cast this spell only during combat before blockers are declared. Target creature can't block this turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you'd been there, you would've run from that deer, too!" —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

card.name: Pentagram of the Ages
card.property: {4}, {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take this item, for instance. How would it destroy us, Relicbane?" —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Pestilence Rats
card.property: Pestilence Rats's power is equal to the number of other Rats on the battlefield. (For example, as long as there are two other Rats on the battlefield, Pestilence Rats's power and toughness are 2/3.)

card.name: Phantasmal Mount
card.property: Flying {T}: Target creature you control with toughness 2 or less gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn. When Phantasmal Mount leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice that creature. When the creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Phantasmal Mount.

card.name: Pit Trap
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Pit Trap: Destroy target attacking creature without flying. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These traps are truly a symbol of great cruelty and sinister cunning." —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

card.name: Polar Kraken
card.property: Trample Polar Kraken enters the battlefield tapped. Cumulative upkeep—Sacrifice a land. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was big. Really, really, big. No, bigger than that. It was big!" —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

card.name: Portent
card.property: Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order. You may have that player shuffle their library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Power Sink
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

card.name: Pox
card.property: Each player loses a third of their life, then discards a third of the cards in their hand, then sacrifices a third of the creatures they control, then sacrifices a third of the lands they control. Round up each time.

card.name: Prismatic Ward
card.property: Enchant creature As Prismatic Ward enters the battlefield, choose a color. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature by sources of the chosen color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These, of all spells, must have common components I can isolate and use." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Pygmy Allosaurus
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't understand the appeal of keeping these things as pets, unless you want your children eaten." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

card.name: Pyknite
card.property: When Pyknite enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never cross a Pyknite, if you value your scalp." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Pyroblast
card.property: Choose one — • Counter target spell if it's blue. • Destroy target permanent if it's blue.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just the thing for those pesky water mages." —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

card.name: Pyroclasm
card.property: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Leaves more room for the big ones to fight in, you know." —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

card.name: Rally
card.property: Blocking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stand your ground, troops! This shall be our finest hour!" —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox, last words

card.name: Ray of Command
card.property: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.

card.name: Ray of Erasure
card.property: Target player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What is real can be unreal." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

card.name: Reality Twist
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1}{U}{U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) If tapped for mana, Plains produce {R}, Swamps produce {G}, Mountains produce {W}, and Forests produce {B} instead of any other type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nothing is as it seems."—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

card.name: Reclamation
card.property: Black creatures can't attack unless their controller sacrifices a land for each black creature they control that's attacking. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We shall oppose Lim-Dûl and his forces by any means necessary, even if the very earth be torn asunder." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

card.name: Red Scarab
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by red creatures. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a red permanent.

card.name: Regeneration
