card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) {G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Faith in Freyalise has given me the gift, not the curse, of unprecedented longevity." —Laina of the Elvish Council

card.name: Rime Dryad
card.property: Snow forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a snow Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Dryads told us to stay, as no new horrors would come when it was so cold. Three of us left anyway. The rest believed their lies, and their skeletons weren't found until the thaw." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Ritual of Subdual
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) If a land is tapped for mana, it produces colorless mana instead of any other type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That which does not bend to the will of Freyalise shall surely break." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: River Delta
card.property: River Delta doesn't untap during your untap step if it has a depletion counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a depletion counter from River Delta. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. Put a depletion counter on River Delta.

card.name: Runed Arch
card.property: Runed Arch enters the battlefield tapped. {X}, {T}, Sacrifice Runed Arch: X target creatures with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Sabretooth Tiger
card.property: First strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Daughter, it is now your turn to hunt the Tiger, and make a blanket of its fur." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Sacred Boon
card.property: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, put a +0/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Divine gifts are granted to those who are worthy." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Flourishing during the Ice Age, these Wurms were the bane of all Kjeldorans. Their great size and ferocity made them the subject of countless nightmares—they embodied the worst of the Ice Age." —Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

card.name: Sea Spirit
card.property: {U}: Sea Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It rose above our heads, above the ship, and still higher yet. No foggy, ice-laden sea in the world could frighten me more." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

card.name: Seizures
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, Seizures deals 3 damage to that creature's controller unless that player pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sheathe your sword, warrior, lest ye fall on it when stricken." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Seraph
card.property: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Seraph this turn dies, put that card onto the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step. Sacrifice the creature when you lose control of Seraph.

card.name: Shambling Strider
card.property: {R} {G}: Shambling Strider gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Freyalise forbid that any stranger should wander into the Striders' territory.

card.name: Shatter
card.property: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the past be the past. Do not call up that which you cannot put down. Destroy that which destroyed us, so long ago." —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

card.name: Shield Bearer
card.property: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have almost completed your four years, my son. Soon you shall be a Skyknight." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

card.name: Shield of the Ages
card.property: {2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This shield is a true rarity: an artifact whose purpose is obvious." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Shyft
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have Shyft become the color or colors of your choice. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Capturing this specimen was not easy. Study it well, that you someday might be as versatile." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

card.name: Sibilant Spirit
card.property: Flying Whenever Sibilant Spirit attacks, defending player may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Relax. I'm sure it's just a snake hissing." —Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

card.name: Silver Erne
card.property: Flying, trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen a larger Erne knock a Giant to the ground and stay airborne. They move not with the wind, but as the wind." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

card.name: Skeleton Ship
card.property: When you control no Islands, sacrifice Skeleton Ship. {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sea gives up her dead as easily as the soil." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Skull Catapult
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skull Catapult deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let any who doubt the evil of using the ancient devices look at this infernal machine. What manner of fiend would design such a sadistic device?" —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

card.name: Sleight of Mind
card.property: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another. (For example, you may change "target black spell" to "target blue spell." This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Snow Devil
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Enchanted creature has first strike as long as it's blocking and you control a snow land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give me wings to fly and speed to strike. In return, the glory I earn shall be yours." —Steinar Icefist, Balduvian Shaman

card.name: Snow Fortress
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {1}: Snow Fortress gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {1}: Snow Fortress gets +0/+1 until end of turn. {3}: Snow Fortress deals 1 damage to target creature without flying that's attacking you.

card.name: Snow Hound
card.property: {1}, {T}: Return Snow Hound and target green or blue creature you control to their owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you're starving, eat your horses, your dead, or yourself—but never eat your dog." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

card.name: Snowblind
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -X/-Y. If that creature is attacking, X is the number of snow lands defending player controls. Otherwise, X is the number of snow lands its controller controls. Y is equal to X or to enchanted creature's toughness minus 1, whichever is smaller.

card.name: Snowfall
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Whenever an Island is tapped for mana, its controller may add an additional {U}. If that Island is snow, its controller may add an additional {U}{U} instead. Spend this mana only to pay cumulative upkeep costs.

card.name: Soldevi Golem
card.property: Soldevi Golem doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may untap target tapped creature an opponent controls. If you do, untap Soldevi Golem.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Slow and steady wins the race.

card.name: Soldevi Machinist
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to activate abilities of artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Perhaps this time the power of the artificers shall be used wisely." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Soldevi Simulacrum
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) {1}: Soldevi Simulacrum gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They look human— until they bleed.

card.name: Songs of the Damned
card.property: Add {B} for each creature card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not wind, but the breath of the dead.

card.name: Soul Barrier
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a creature spell, Soul Barrier deals 2 damage to that player unless they pay {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's more than one way to skin an Ouphe—or thwart a mage." —Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

card.name: Soul Burn
card.property: Spend only black and/or red mana on X. Soul Burn deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more than the amount of {B} spent on X, the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.

card.name: Soul Kiss
card.property: Enchant creature {B}, Pay 1 life: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than three times each turn.

card.name: Spectral Shield
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 and can't be the target of spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What can be a stronger shield than concealment? Have you ever defeated an enemy you didn't know existed?" —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

card.name: Spoils of Evil
card.property: For each artifact or creature card in target opponent's graveyard, add {C} and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Virtue has its rewards, as does its opposite." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Spoils of War
card.property: X is the number of artifact and/or creature cards in an opponent's graveyard as you cast this spell. Distribute X +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is the fun part!" —Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician

card.name: Staff of the Ages
card.property: Creatures with landwalk abilities can be blocked as though they didn't have those abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We found this staff useful on our visit to this very commission. Would Relicbane prefer we had been slain by Lim-Dûl's horrors?" —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Stampede
card.property: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We could see the horizon blacken with the great beasts, but it was too late. The icefield offered no immediate safety, but luckily most of us reached a crevasse in which we could take cover." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Stench of Evil
card.property: Destroy all Plains. For each land destroyed this way, Stench of Evil deals 1 damage to that land's controller unless they pay {2}.

card.name: Stone Rain
card.property: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May the forces that took Argoth beneath the waves never come among us again." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Stone Spirit
card.property: Stone Spirit can't be blocked by creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The spirit of the stone is the spirit of strength." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Stonehands
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2. {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Trust in the power of stone. Stone is strong; stone shatters swords; stone breaks bones. Trust in stone." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Storm Spirit
card.property: Flying {T}: Storm Spirit deals 2 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Come to us, with your lightning. Come to us, with your thunder. Serve us with your strength, and smite our foes with your power." —Steinar Icefist, Balduvian Shaman

card.name: Stormbind
card.property: {2}, Discard a card at random: Stormbind deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once, our people could call down the storm itself to do our bidding." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Stromgald Cabal
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life: Counter target white spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kjeldor must be supreme at any cost." —Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

card.name: Stunted Growth
card.property: Target player chooses three cards from their hand and puts them on top of their library in any order.

card.name: Sulfurous Springs
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. Sulfurous Springs deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Sunstone
card.property: {2}, Sacrifice a snow land: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I dispute Relicbane's hysterical allegations, Commissioner, but it is true that these artifacts can be dangerous." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.property: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The so-called Barbarians will not respect us for our military might—they will respect us for our honor." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

card.name: Tarpan
card.property: When Tarpan dies, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A good Tarpan will serve you, faithful and true. A bad one will kick you in the head." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

card.name: Thermokarst
card.property: Destroy target land. If that land was a snow land, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Finally we understand the lesson of our home: loss begets renewal." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Thoughtleech
card.property: Whenever an Island an opponent controls becomes tapped, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A resourceful mage has many sources of information. The best one is your foe." —Zur the Enchanter

card.name: Thunder Wall
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying {U}: Thunder Wall gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Lemures had barely taken wing when the sky roared with thunder. The swarm of little beasts wavered, divided, and fell, crashing to the earth." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

card.name: Timberline Ridge
card.property: Timberline Ridge doesn't untap during your untap step if it has a depletion counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a depletion counter from Timberline Ridge. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. Put a depletion counter on Timberline Ridge.

card.name: Time Bomb
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on Time Bomb. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Time Bomb: Time Bomb deals damage equal to the number of time counters on it to each creature and each player.

card.name: Tinder Wall
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Sacrifice Tinder Wall: Add {R}{R}. {R}, Sacrifice Tinder Wall: It deals 2 damage to target creature it's blocking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What do you do then? Run. Run very fast. Don't stop until you see the camp—or a bigger Giant." —Toothlicker Harj, Orcish Captain

card.name: Total War
card.property: Whenever a player attacks with one or more creatures, destroy all untapped non-Wall creatures that player controls that didn't attack, except for creatures the player hasn't controlled continuously since the beginning of the turn.

card.name: Touch of Death
card.property: Touch of Death deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. You gain 1 life. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What was yours is mine. Your land, your people, and now your life." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Touch of Vitae
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature gains haste and "{0}: Untap this creature. Activate this ability only once." Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Trailblazer
card.property: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our Elvish Hunter Taaveti led us swiftly along hidden paths through the dense forest. We caught the Orcs from behind, and completely by surprise." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

card.name: Underground River
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. Underground River deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Updraft
card.property: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The power of flight has but one equal in battle: surprise. Understanding how to use both is the key to victory." —Arnjlot Olasson, Sky Mage

card.name: Urza's Bauble
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Urza's Bauble: Look at a card at random in target player's hand. You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Veldt
card.property: Veldt doesn't untap during your untap step if it has a depletion counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a depletion counter from Veldt. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. Put a depletion counter on Veldt.

card.name: Venomous Breath
card.property: Choose target creature. At this turn's next end of combat, destroy all creatures that blocked or were blocked by it this turn.

card.name: Vertigo
card.property: Vertigo deals 2 damage to target creature with flying. That creature loses flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I saw the wizard gesturing, but I didn't guess his plan until my Aesthir cried out and went into a dive." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

card.name: Vexing Arcanix
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target player chooses a card name, then reveals the top card of their library. If that card has the chosen name, that player puts it into their hand. Otherwise, they put it into their graveyard and Vexing Arcanix deals 2 damage to them.

card.name: Vibrating Sphere
card.property: As long as it's your turn, creatures you control get +2/+0. As long as it's not your turn, creatures you control get -0/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Unearthly and invisible fibers emanate from this sphere, entangling all who draw near." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Walking Wall
card.property: Defender {3}: Walking Wall gets +3/-1 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fortress is not what it seems." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Wall of Lava
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {R}: Wall of Lava gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now there's something you don't see every day." —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

card.name: Wall of Pine Needles
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {G}: Regenerate Wall of Pine Needles.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The power of the forest takes a hundred forms. Some are more surprising than others.

card.name: Wall of Shields
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Banding (If any creatures with banding you control are blocking a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's the pokey bits that hurt the most." —Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician

card.name: War Chariot
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I wouldn't advise using it with a Woolly Mammoth, but it's quite appropriate for many other beasts." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Warning
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The folk of the Karplusan Mountains are impossible to ambush." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Whalebone Glider
card.property: {2}, {T}: Target creature with power 3 or less gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's no Ornithopter, but then I'm no Urza." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: White Scarab
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by white creatures. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a white permanent.

card.name: Whiteout
card.property: All creatures lose flying until end of turn. Sacrifice a snow land: Return Whiteout from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Wiitigo
card.property: Wiitigo enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Wiitigo if it has blocked or been blocked since your last upkeep. Otherwise, remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

card.name: Wild Growth
card.property: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here in Fyndhorn, where Freyalise's power is strongest, the forest has its own opinion." —Laina of the Elvish Council

card.name: Wind Spirit
card.property: Flying Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To visit the sky requires bravery, and thought, and little else. To master the sky requires the binding of its masters, and little else." —Arnjlot Olasson, Sky Mage

card.name: Wings of Aesthir
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has flying and first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For those of courage, even the sky holds no limit." —Arnjlot Olasson, Sky Mage

card.name: Winter's Chill
card.property: Cast this spell only during combat before blockers are declared. X can't be greater than the number of snow lands you control. Choose X target attacking creatures. For each of those creatures, its controller may pay {1} or {2}. If that player doesn't, destroy that creature at end of combat. If that player pays only {1}, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this combat.

card.name: Withering Wisps
card.property: At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Withering Wisps. {B}: Withering Wisps deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. Activate this ability no more times each turn than the number of snow Swamps you control.

card.name: Woolly Mammoths
card.property: Woolly Mammoths has trample as long as you control a snow land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mammoths may be good to ride on, but they're certainly bad to fall off of!" —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Woolly Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We need not fear the forces of the air; I've yet to see a Spider without an appetite." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

card.name: Word of Blasting
card.property: Destroy target Wall. It can't be regenerated. Word of Blasting deals damage equal to that Wall's converted mana cost to the Wall's controller.

card.name: Word of Undoing
card.property: Return target creature and all white Auras you own attached to it to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was in Urza's journals that I finally found the secret at the core of the summonings." —Journal, author unknown

card.name: Wrath of Marit Lage
card.property: When Wrath of Marit Lage enters the battlefield, tap all red creatures. Red creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dread Marit Lage lies dreaming, not dead.

card.name: Yavimaya Gnats
card.property: Flying {G}: Regenerate Yavimaya Gnats.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is our third day of travel on the Yavimaya River, and still these creatures plague us. Davin Lansson, our naturalist, has facetiously labeled them 'gnats,' and the name has stuck." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Zur's Weirding
card.property: Players play with their hands revealed. If a player would draw a card, they reveal it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.

card.name: Zuran Enchanter
card.property: {2} {B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are Kjeldorans no more." —Zur the Enchanter

card.name: Zuran Orb
card.property: Sacrifice a land: You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will go to any length to achieve my goal. Eternal life is worth any sacrifice." —Zur the Enchanter

card.name: Zuran Spellcaster
card.property: {T}: Zuran Spellcaster deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A mage must be precise as well as potent; cautious, as well as clever." —Zur the Enchanter
